page.title: 09POLICEMAN
page.content: My dad works as a policeman. He works at Tenterden police station. Sometimes he works nights and sleeps durig the day. When dad is on night-shift my sister and I have to be very quiet so that we do not wake him. Sometimes our dad does area car work which means that he drives a police car around the town to make sure that everything is alright.Today is July 6th and my dad is working from 4 o'clock in the afternoon until 12 o'clock at night.My dad has been a policeman for 14 years. Tenterden Police Station is in Oaks Road. It is a very small station with only two cells which are very seldom used. Any prisoners are taken to the bigger station at Ashford 15 miles away. Tenterden station closes at 10 p.m. It has a rest room for off-duty officers and is only open to the public during the day.
